QuestData.Title: Dismantling the Opposition
QuestData.Description:
The Forsworn mobilize!
We cannot allow them to march.
Attune to Bron, share your power with him.
Between the three of us, we shall destroy this new centurion army!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride Bron, then defeat $2oa Forsworn forces and dismantle $3oa Colossus in the Eternal Forge.
